Summary: Appeared as a slowly spinning cone with green lighting wrapping it, silent.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around October 27th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsThat night, I was walking over to my house when I noticed a bright green light up in the sky and saw the UFO. I thought the object was a Cessna when I first saw it, but I would have heard it at that altitude and it was glowing green, unlike a normal aircraft. The object appeared in a flash of green then moved from 39 degrees above the horizon to about 25 degrees when it disappeared. It had a stripe of green light on it that disappeared and reappeared, so I could tell it was spinning at about 2 rps. I thought it was very strange when I saw it, but pushed it off somewhat because I thought it might have been a n experimental place. I lost sight of the object when it was 25 degrees over the horizon because it disappeared into thin air.
